CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 24, 1954, pg. 7 reads: "Ebenezer's Daily Vacation Bible School - Nearly 200 children and young people enrolled in Vacation Bible School at Ebenezer Baptist Church are being taught their ABC's in Bible study and good community relations by a skilled staff of workers. Mrs. Georgianna Fitzgerald directs the school.  Assisting her are Mmes. Queenie Smith assistant director; Emma Strange, Ann Sales, Catherine Burton, Helen Truss, Artie King, Minnie Hill, Naomi Bray, Isadore Brown and Alberta Moon.  Also Misses Patricia Bray, Ella Lamor, Delphina Bray, Erma Smith, Ernestine Crosby and Josephine Moore.  Miss Mamie Crosby is secretary, Booker Smith Sr. is superintendent and the Rev. James B. Cayce is minister. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Ebenezer Baptist Church vacation bible school students, and staff possibly including Georgianna Fitzgerald, Queenie Smith, Emma Strange, Ann Sales, Catherine Burton, Helen Truss, Artie King, Minnie Hill, Naomi Bray, Isadore Brown, Alberta Moon, Patricia Bray, Ella Lamor, Delphina Bray, Erma Smith, Ernestine Crosby, and Josephine Moore, gathered on front steps, porch, and yard of brick building, another version
